00238    * Has this data block been allocated?
00239    */

00241    {  return (bool) begin_; }

00273    // Template methods
00274 
00275    /*
00276    * Pack an object of type T into send block.
00277    */
00278    template <typename T>
00279    void PackedData::pack(const T& data)
00280    {
00281       if (status_ != PACKING) {
00282          UTIL_THROW("Status is not PACKING");
00283       }
00284       if (cursor_ + sizeof(T) > endAllocated_) {
00285          UTIL_THROW("Attempted write past end of send block");
00286       }
00287       T* ptr = (T *)cursor_;
00288       *ptr = data;
00289       ++ptr;
00290       cursor_ = (Byte *)ptr;
00291    }
00292 
00293    /*
00294    * Pack a C-array of objects of type T.
00295    */
00296    template <typename T>
00297    void PackedData::pack(const T* array, int n)
00298    {
00299       if (status_ != PACKING) {
00300          UTIL_THROW("Status is not PACKING");
00301       }
00302       if (cursor_ + n*sizeof(T) > endAllocated_) {
00303          UTIL_THROW("Attempted write past end of send block");
00304       }
00305       T* ptr = (T *)cursor_;
00306       for (int i=0; i < n; ++i) {
00307          *ptr = array[i];
00308          ++ptr;
00309       }
00310       cursor_ = (Byte *)ptr;
00311    }
00312 
00313    /*
00314    * Unpack one object of type T.
00315    */
00316    template <typename T>
00317    void PackedData::unpack(T& data)
00318    {
00319       if (status_ != UNPACKING) {
00320          UTIL_THROW("Status is not UNPACKING");
00321       }
00322       if (cursor_ + sizeof(data) > endPacked_) {
00323          UTIL_THROW("Attempted read past end of packed block");
00324       }
00325       T* ptr = (T *)cursor_;
00326       data = *ptr;
00327       ++ptr;
00328       cursor_ = (Byte *)ptr;
00329    }
00330 
00331    /*
00332    * Unpack a C-array of objects of type T.
00333    */
00334    template <typename T>
00335    void PackedData::unpack(T* array, int n)
00336    {
00337       if (status_ != UNPACKING) {
00338          UTIL_THROW("Status is not UNPACKING");
00339       }
00340       if (cursor_ + n*sizeof(T) > endPacked_) {
00341          UTIL_THROW("Attempted write past end of send block");
00342       }
00343       T* ptr = (T *)cursor_;
00344       for (int i=0; i < n; ++i) {
00345          array[i] = *ptr;
00346          ++ptr;
00347       }
00348       cursor_ = (Byte *)ptr;
00349    }
00350
